## Formulae of Solids

### Cylinder volume

Volume, $V = \pi r^2h$; where

$\pi = 3.1416$ (approximately)

r = radius of the base of the cylinder

h = height of the cylinder

[See examples here](https://www.bing.com/images/search?q=Cylinder+Volume+Equation&form=RESTAB&first=1&tsc=ImageHoverTitle)
